meanings.sent1: I was deleing the unnecessary text from the document.

meanings.sent3: After deleing the wrong answer, the quiz looked much better.

meanings.definition: The act of deleting or removing something from a document or file
meanings.sent1: The deleing of the paragraph improved the clarity of the report.
meanings.sent2: She always double-checks before finalizing the deleing in the spreadsheet.
meanings.sent3: The sudden deleing of the important section left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: The deleing of the virus-infected files saved the computer from crashing.
